Articles.Content:
Ever since I updated to 1.2, when my pod landed on water, it just sank to the bottom of the sea, please help.

 

Mod list:

http://imgur.com/a/NiF0g

Edited October 12, 2016 by AntarcticKitten
Forgot to add mod list.

Half of those mods you have are not yet updated to 1.2, your issue is probably related to that.

Edit: And also you have not updated to the latest versions of some mods which are out. The Module manager you have installed is for 1.1.3.

Edited October 12, 2016 by Torih

I dunno, are you're mods updated?

seeing as 1.2's been out for not even 1 day yet, I'd say "no."

so maybe try playing without mods that don't support the current version until then.

18 minutes ago, Greenfire32 said:

I dunno, are you're mods updated?

seeing as 1.2's been out for not even 1 day yet, I'd say "no."

so maybe try playing without mods that don't support the current version until then.

I'm using CKAN, is there any way to disable the mods without uninstalling them so I don't have to write a list of the mods I have?

40 minutes ago, Torih said:

Half of those mods you have are not yet updated to 1.2, your issue is probably related to that.

Edit: And also you have not updated to the latest versions of some mods which are out. The Module manager you have installed is for 1.1.3.

Since this post, I have a few mods that updated, so I do have a new list of my mods. Woops. 

http://imgur.com/a/uuuyY

16 hours ago, Greenfire32 said:

I dunno, are you're mods updated?

seeing as 1.2's been out for not even 1 day yet, I'd say "no."

so maybe try playing without mods that don't support the current version until then.

I disabled/removed pretty much all the mods since none were really compatible / no longer required. However Command pod started sinking on my 3rd mission, which was surprising to say the least. Made me think that was actually a change in the game physics, also previously working builds had trouble reaching space and orbit.. Would be interesting to read the changelog for 1.2?

14 minutes ago, Kerbonaut_123 said:

I disabled/removed pretty much all the mods since none were really compatible / no longer required. However Command pod started sinking on my 3rd mission, which was surprising to say the least. Made me think that was actually a change in the game physics, also previously working builds had trouble reaching space and orbit.. Would be interesting to read the changelog for 1.2?

That's your problem methinks. Also, change logs for 1.2 are available in the main threads for them.
